projectData.name: Form builder
projectData.description: Build forms with ease. Drag & Drop web-site builder
projectData.fullDescription: This web application, developed using Next.js and TypeScript, offers a powerful and user-friendly interface for creating custom forms. Users can effortlessly design their forms by dragging and dropping a variety of aesthetically pleasing blocks. Each block represents different types of input fields such as text boxes, checkboxes, radio buttons, and more. The intuitive drag-and-drop functionality ensures that even users with no coding experience can build complex forms with ease. Once the form is created and published, the application provides comprehensive analytics and statistics on the form's performance. Users can track metrics such as the number of submissions, average completion time, and field-specific data. These insights help users understand how their forms are being used and identify areas for improvement.
feature: Safe your page in the DataBase
Back-end logic, safe page and collecting response

projectData.name: Sanity/Stripe E-commerce
projectData.description: Simple store. Payments test mode on
projectData.fullDescription: This web application, developed using Next.js and TypeScript, is an advanced E-commerce platform integrating Sanity for content management and Stripe for payment processing. It is designed to offer a comprehensive and user-friendly solution for creating and managing an online store.

projectData.name: GraphQL Shope
projectData.description: Client Shope Storefront /Server API on GraphQL
projectData.fullDescription: This web application, developed using React-JS and TypeScript, is a robust CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) GraphQL CMS platform what I build just for practice GraphQL client side and server side, yes this is FULL-STACK app (THIS PROJECT IS CURRENTLY NOT AVAILABLE, but you can check my the source code on my GitHub). It is designed to offer a seamless and efficient content management experience, perfect for developers, content creators, and businesses looking to manage their digital content effectively.

projectData.name: Marketplace
projectData.description: This project is in development now.
projectData.fullDescription: This web application, developed using Next.js and TypeScript, is a sophisticated Product Marketplace platform designed to facilitate seamless product listing, browsing, and purchasing. It is ideal for businesses, entrepreneurs, and individuals looking to create and manage an online marketplace.

projectData.name: Podify - music app
projectData.fullDescription: This mobile application, developed using React Native for a cross-platform (IOS & Android) user interface and Node.js with Express.js for the backend, delivers a comprehensive music streaming experience. Designed to cater to music enthusiasts, the app offers a variety of features to discover, play, and share music effortlessly.
feature: My Own full custom API on Express-JS & Node-JS

projectData.name: Chatroom (FireBase)
projectData.description: Full feature chat app, for IOS & Android
projectData.fullDescription: This mobile application, developed using React Native for a cross-platform user interface and Firebase for the backend, provides a full-featured chat experience. Designed for seamless communication, the app incorporates a wide array of features to facilitate real-time messaging, media sharing, and user engagement.
